article_title: After Obamacare, Robots May Be Cure for Health Care’s Problems
article_text:
Jim Cramer's 'Mad Money' Recap: Here's This Week's Game Plan

With the Fed out of the way, it's safe to invest again, Cramer says. He'll be watching company earnings and economic data this week.

article_metadata.description: Robots will have an overwhelmingly beneficial effect on healthcare compared to other industries. This is because healthcare does not meet the needs of the marketplace today.
article_metadata.author: Gopi Mattel
